column2: Frostmourne
A runeblade forged by the Lich King for his chosen champion, imbued with the power to consume souls.
Helm of Domination
Crafted by the Burning Legion to hold the spirit of the Lich King, whomever wears it becomes the ruler of the Scourge.
Crown of Stromgarde
The crown of the human kingdom of Stromgarde.
Crown of Lordaeron
The crown of the human kingdom of Lordaeron.
Crown of Alterac
The crown of the human kingdom of Alterac.
Crown of Gilneas
The crown of the human kingdom of Gilneas.
Crown of Kul Tiras
The crown of the human kingdom of Kul Tiras.
Crown of Stormwind
The crown of the human kingdom of Stormwind.
Hammer of the Lightbringer
The hammer of the legendary paladin Uther the Lightbringer.
Gloves of the Silver Hand
The gloves of the legendary paladin Uther the Lightbringer.
Shroud of the Lightbringer
The cape of the legendary paladin Uther the Lightbringer.
Valius, Gavel of the Lightbringer
A gavel once belonging to the legendary paladin Uther the Lightbringer.
Tome of Divinity
The holy libram of the legendary paladin Uther the Lightbringer.
Book of Medivh
The spellbook of the Last Guardian, Medivh.
Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian
The Greatstaff of the Guardian has been passed from one Guardian of Tirisfal to the next since the inception of the role.
Val'anyr, Hammer of Ancient Kings
Created by the Titans, Val'anyr was given to the first Earthen king to give life to the rest of his brethren.
Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker
The sword of the prince of elemental air, Thunderaan, who was defeated and bound by the Fire Lord Ragnaros.
Sulfuras, Hand of Ragnaros
The hammer of the Fire Lord Ragnaros, coated in elemental flames and capable of crushing through nearly anything.
Trol'kalar
Also known as Trollbane, this is the legendary blade of the Trollbane dynasty and is especially effective when striking trolls.
Doomhammer
A powerful hammer forged in a pool of elemental lava on Draenor, destined to be wielded by a stranger who'll use it for justice.
Fury of the Stonemother
A hammer made of pure elemental earth, held together by elemental and shamanic magic.
Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury
A bow of unknown origin and history, but inextricably linked to the Sunwell.
Gorehowl
The great axe of the Hellscream line of the Warsong clan, named for the sound it makes when swung.
Ashbringer
Forged from a purified relic once deeply tainted by the Void, this blade turns undead to ash with the merest touch of its blade.
Corrupted Ashbringer
The corrupted form of the legendary Ashbringer, stained by an act of cold murder.
Eye of Dalaran
A relic created by the mages of Dalaran to focus their magic in order to reconstruct the Violet Citadel.
Eye of Sargeras
The eye of the Avatar of Sargeras, who once walked upon Azeroth before being brought down by a Guardian.
The Silver Hand
The hammer of the Titanic Keeper Tyr, who sacrificed himself in battle against two faceless generals.
Apocalypse
Forged by the demonic nathrezim, it was wielded across various battlefields against the foes of the Burning Legion.
Ebonchill
A staff of great power, the only link of the first Guardian Alodi to his unknown parents.
Aluneth, Greatstaff of the Magna
Created when a magic-consuming entity was bound to an enchanted greatstaff, Aluneth constantly urges its wielder to set it free.
Ulthalesh, the Deadwind Harvester
An artifact created by Sargeras from the soul of a powerful Dreadlord who opposed him during the Legion's creation, it grants great power… if the wielder can avoid being consumed by it.
